text.name: system_description
text.text: Toaplan is a Japanese company created in 1984 which carries out its activity in the development of the video game and which closed in 1994. It is known for its innovative arcade games for the time, mainly shoot them up like Tiger Heli, Twin Cobra, Out Zone or Batsugun.
